socials.social-description: Select the socials you want to showcase on your page – choose only those you'd like to be visible!
socials.support-description: Please provide the links for the following:
socials.emails-description: Transactional emails, such as those containing verification codes, are sent automatically to users. If you’d like to update these fields, please reach out to our team.
socials.contact-support-to-change: If you’d like to update these fields, please reach out to our team.
